istd::IChangeDelegator Class Reference

Common interface for all classes that supports delegation of their updates to another class. More...

#include <IChangeDelegator.h>

Detailed Description

Common interface for all classes that supports delegation of their updates to another class.

This is usefull for composed objects to delegate information about changes from a child element to its owner.

Definition at line 17 of file IChangeDelegator.h.

virtual istd::IChangeable* istd::IChangeDelegator::GetSlavePtr ( ) const [pure virtual]

Sets the slave object pointer.

Its IChangeable methods will be called, if this object is updated.
